ModMetaData.name: Cannibal Meals (VGP required)
ModMetaData.author: Mlie
ModMetaData.description:
Adds cannibal versions of all base and Vegetable Garden Project-meals.
General • Add these recipes/meals: Pemmican, Kibble, Simple Meal, Fine Meal, Lavish Meal, Packaged Survival Meal, Stir-Fry, Stew, Pizza, Salted Meat, Cheeseburger, Tacos, Meat Pie, Kabobs, Grilled Steak • Has added texture on the original textures to indicate cannibal-version. • Stats and nutritions are the same as the original meals. • Adds a Cannibal meal category for sorting.
Compatibilities • Compatible with existent saves and other mods. • Requires Vegetable Garden + VG Gourmet
